tag_list: ronn-torossian, 5wpr, public-relations, pr, pr-firm, pr-agency, ny-pr-firm, ronn-d--torossian
overview:
Ronn Torossian is the CEO of 5WPR, a top 25 US PR firm. Under his leadership, 5WPR has grown to the INC. 500 list, and his client work has included Pepsi-Cola, Coca-Cola, Microsoft, Anheuser-Busch, Barnes & Noble, Cantor Fitzgerald, IHOP, McDonald’s, Evian, EDS, VeriSign, XM Radio, Seagram’s, The Loews Regency, Bad Boy Worldwide Entertainment, Marriott Hotels, Vail Resorts, Pamela Anderson, Snoop Dogg, the Government of Israel, and others.

Ronn Torossian is regularly featured in the national media for his PR Expertise . Earlier in his career, Torossian served as a Group Director for a major InterPublic Group (IPG) PR agency.

Torossian is a past semi-finalist for Ernst & Young’s Entrepreneur of the Year. NYC born and raised, he resides on Manhattan’s Upper West Side and was named to PR Week’s “40 Under 40” List and Advertising Age’s “40 Under 40” list. His book, “For Immediate Release” was released in 2011 and is available at bookstores nationwide.

Ronn Torossian resides in NYC, and is a regular lecturer at universities and conferences, a member of Young Presidents Organization (YPO), and a board member of numerous non-profit organizations.

milestones.description: Ronn Torossian was named to PR Week’s “40 Under 40″
